data.title: Survey of 2004 and 2008 Presidential contenders' campaign websites
data.text:
OnTheIssues.org excerpts: (click on issues for details) Abortion

Frank McEnulty: Abortion is moral issue best decided by a woman herself.

Chuck Baldwin: God begins human life at fertilization.

Brian Moore: Oppose all restrictions on access to abortion.

Barack Obama: Stem cells hold promise to cure 70 major diseases.

John Cox: Define unborn life as a fundamental right.

Michael Badnarik: Veto any legislation restricting right to choose.

Michael Badnarik: Oppose government control over the abortion issue.

David Cobb: Full reproductive freedom for women.

Wesley Clark: Let a woman and her doctors decide about reproductive health.

Wesley Clark: Women deserve access to birth control & reproductive choice. Budget & Economy

Chuck Baldwin: Restore a debt free, interest free money system.

Duncan Hunter: Balance the budget by cutting spending, except in defense.

Duncan Hunter: Efficiency reform: remove duplicative & ineffective programs.

Mike Huckabee: Created state surplus in AR; cut spending to do same for US.

John Cox: Veto every federal budget that is not balanced, period.

Gary Nolan: Downsize the federal budget.

Wesley Clark: Plan for jobs-invest in security & budget relief to states.

Wesley Clark: A healthy economy depends on long-term deficit reduction.

Wesley Clark: Balance the budget & reduce long-term debt.

George W. Bush: Investment and aid to states will help economy rebound.

George W. Bush: Provides assistance to new small businesses. Civil Rights

Frank McEnulty: No constitutional amendment for flag burning.

Brian Moore: Assure equal rights by gender, race, & age.

Brian Moore: End all restrictions on marriages and sodomy laws.

Duncan Hunter: Hate crimes on sexual orientation threaten equal protection.

Barack Obama: Better enforce womens pay equity via Equal Pay Act.

Barack Obama: Strengthen the Americans with Disabilities Act.

John Cox: Swift passage of the Federal Marriage Amendment.

Jim Gilmore: Oppose gay marriage AND so-called civil unions.

Ralph Nader: Patriot Act associated with abuse of Muslims civil rights.

Michael Badnarik: Help minorities by removing barriers to self-employment.

Michael Badnarik: Let people, including gays, marry as they see fit.

David Cobb: US history is constant struggle for more democracy.

David Cobb: Affirmative action for people of color and women.

David Cobb: Support Native Peoples to protect their treaty rights.

David Cobb: Marriage equality for lesbians and gays.

Wesley Clark: Eliminate wage gap for women.

Wesley Clark: Strong enforcement of Civil Rights Act including hate crimes.

Wesley Clark: Dont compromise freedom for problems like terrorism. Corporations

Chuck Baldwin: Restore manufacturing base, not multinational corporations.

Brian Moore: Cap and reduce corporate profits and executive salary.

Barack Obama: End tax breaks for companies that send jobs overseas.

Barack Obama: Hold corporations responsible for pensions & work conditions.

John Cox: Level playing field for family farms over corporate farms.

David Cobb: Priorities include ending transnational corporate empire. Crime

Frank McEnulty: Death penalty is a state issue.

Mike Gravel: Eliminate mandatory minimum sentencing laws.

Michael Badnarik: Require offenders to compensate their victims.

David Cobb: Criminal justice system permeated with race & class bias.

David Cobb: No private, for-profit prisons.

Michael Badnarik: End mandatory minimums for drug offendors.

Gary Nolan: End profiling based on stereotypes.

John Edwards: More DNA testing to reduce wrongful capital convictions.

Howard Dean: Death penalty for extreme and heinous crimes.

Howard Dean: Apply death penalty fairly & strengthen protections. Drugs

Brian Moore: Cutoff all U.S. military aid to Colombia.

Mike Gravel: War on drugs loses an entire generation to our prisons.

Michael Badnarik: Self-medication should be up to individuals, not government.

Michael Badnarik: Drug War also has funded terrorism.

Michael Badnarik: Block federal spending on the War on Drugs.

Gary Nolan: Repeal failed policy of federal drug laws.

John Edwards: Disparity in penalty for crack vs. powder is not justified.

George W. Bush: $600M plan help 300,000 addicts via vouchers.

George W. Bush: Use faith-based programs for addicted Americans.

Howard Dean: Hammer the dealers; treat the casual users. Education

Frank McEnulty: Prayer in school is not about separating church & state.

Chuck Baldwin: Tax relief for homeschooling, private & religious schools.

Chuck Baldwin: Disband the Department of Education; its unconstitutional.

Bob Barr: Dont let California home schooling ban spread.

Brian Moore: Promote universal access to education.

Duncan Hunter: Supports vouchers & home schooling.

Barack Obama: STEP UP: summer learning opportunities for disadvantaged.

Barack Obama: First Senate bill: increase Pell Grant from $4,050 to $5,100.

John Cox: School monopoly is problem; competition is answer.

Wesley Clark: No vouchers for private schools.

Wesley Clark: Fund Elementary & Secondary Education Act and more.

Wesley Clark: Fully fund Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.

Wesley Clark: Would support initiatives to make teaching prestigious.

Wesley Clark: Will ensure universal access to pre-school.

Wesley Clark: Education includes job transitioning for adults.

George W. Bush: Increased per-student funding by almost 60%.

George W. Bush: Reading First program successful.

George W. Bush: No Child Left Behind increases accountability.

George W. Bush: Local control is core principle of successful education.

George W. Bush: Give options for kids trapped in failing schools.

George W. Bush: Increased funding to $200M for charter schools.

George W. Bush: Public schools are Americas great hope.

George W. Bush: Increased school funding by $11B since taking office. Energy & Oil

Brian Moore: Support Kyoto; phaseout nuclear; develop alternatives.

John Cox: Support domestic drilling; oppose Kyoto Treaty.

Mike Gravel: Make Global Warming a matter of national security.

Michael Badnarik: End oil company subsidies & restrictions on alternatives.

David Cobb: Move towards energy independence from renewable sources.

Mike Huckabee: Stewardship of the air and land and soil is very important.

Bob Barr: Human beings are more important than mussels.

Brian Moore: Public ownership of all natural resources.

Brian Moore: Support sustainable organic agriculture & family farms.

Duncan Hunter: Opposes Kelo property rights; restrict eminent domain.

Barack Obama: Reduce mercury and lead to protect community health.

Barack Obama: Protect the Great Lakes & our National Parks and Forests.

Michael Badnarik: Protect the environment by defending property rights.

Wesley Clark: Reinvigorate EPA action on environmental justice.

Wesley Clark: Will enforce Clean Air Act, and no net loss of wetlands.

Wesley Clark: Will hold business accountable for toxic waste.

Wesley Clark: No drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

Wesley Clark: Incentives for energy efficiency & alternative fuels.

Wesley Clark: Balance commercial exploitation with respect for nature.

Wesley Clark: Assist market-driven population adjustments, like in 1800s.

George W. Bush: Good stewardship is personal responsibility and public value.

George W. Bush: Clear Skies Initiative improves air quality now.

George W. Bush: Proposes $211M to cleaning up brownfields.

George W. Bush: Natural resources & environment funding in FY04 highest ever. Families & Children

Duncan Hunter: Protect parental authority against psychological parents.

Mike Huckabee: Supports convenant marriage; adopted it in Arkansas.

John Cox: Government should be family friendly.

Wesley Clark: Give workers flexibility & increase production.

Wesley Clark: Same sex couples should have same rights as heterosexuals.

George W. Bush: New relief plans focus on the American family. Foreign Policy

Chuck Baldwin: End international meddling of the New World Order.

Chuck Baldwin: No US participation in United Nations or world court.

Brian Moore: End US embargo against Cuba.

Duncan Hunter: Increase the burden-sharing at UN.

Barack Obama: Strengthen NATO to face 21st-century threats.

Barack Obama: $50B annually to strengthen weak states at risk of collapse.

Gary Nolan: End support of authoritarian regimes and dictators.

Wesley Clark: End Chinas currency manipulation to help US manufacturers.

Wesley Clark: Establish Civilian Reserve for times of military need.

George W. Bush: Help poor countries around the world. Free Trade

Chuck Baldwin: No North American Union; no NAFTA Superhighway.

Brian Moore: Fair trade instead of NAFTA, CAFTA, and WTO.

Barack Obama: Stand firm against CAFTA for labor & environmental standards.

John Cox: I support free but fair trade policies.

Michael Badnarik: Peace and free trade are mutually dependent.

David Cobb: Marched in Seattle against the WTO.

Wesley Clark: Free trade will work if terms are fair for labor.

John Edwards: Against Fast Track--not enough for US workers. Government Reform

Frank McEnulty: No activist judges.

Chuck Baldwin: Eliminate Food and Drug Administration as unconstitutional.

Brian Moore: Promote public funding of elections.

Barack Obama: Public campaign financing with free television & radio time.

Barack Obama: Create Google for Government to track government spending.

John Cox: Regulation should be governed by the free market.

John Cox: Disclosure is best disinfectant for diseased campaign system.

Mike Gravel: Repeal the Electoral College; enact federal term limits.

David Cobb: Proponent of Instant Runoff Voting.

David Cobb: No corporate campaign donations.

David Cobb: Voters Bill of Rights: clean elections, ballot access, more.

Michael Badnarik: Every regulator we fire creates 150 new jobs.

Wesley Clark: Balance government & market; balance state & federal.

Wesley Clark: Ensure government culture of transparency & accountability. Gun Control

Frank McEnulty: Gun control laws should be decided at state level.

Chuck Baldwin: 2nd Amendment protects our liberty! Go buy a gun!

Duncan Hunter: Criminals prefer unarmed victims.

John Cox: Gun control doesnt work.

Mike Gravel: Require license & training for gun ownership.

Michael Badnarik: Criminals wont prey on armed victims.

Michael Badnarik: Gun control means being able to hit your target.

Wesley Clark: Enforce existing laws & close gun show loophole.

Wesley Clark: Renew ban on assault weapons, & hold gun makers accountable. Health Care

Frank McEnulty: Healthcare costs burden the middle class.

Chuck Baldwin: Freedom of choice for all healthcare decisions.

Chuck Baldwin: No subsidies for HMOs; no forced vaccinations.

Brian Moore: 20 years work experience in HMO/ Managed Care industry.

Brian Moore: National single-payer healthcare system.

Barack Obama: Increase competition in the insurance and drug markets.

Barack Obama: National Health Insurance Exchange for private coverage.

John Cox: Competition brings down costs and improves efficiency.

Michael Badnarik: Tax credits for personal Health Savings Accounts.

David Cobb: Publicly funded, universal health care insurance.

Michael Badnarik: Excess regulations cause high pharmaceutical prices.

Wesley Clark: Insure children & make all coverage more affordable.

Wesley Clark: Promote good health through public health measures.

George W. Bush: Everyone should be able to choose a health plan.

George W. Bush: Senior Rx coverage without government dictates.

George W. Bush: Lift restrictions on Medical Savings Accounts.

George W. Bush: Supports passage of Patients Bill of Rights.

George W. Bush: Endorses billions more in health care funding. Homeland Security

Frank McEnulty: Walk softly and carry a big stick; not worlds policeman.

Frank McEnulty: Patriot Act is scariest thing to happen to civil liberties.

Chuck Baldwin: Deploy a fully-operational strategic defense system.

Chuck Baldwin: Resist reducing benefits to veterans and their survivors.

Chuck Baldwin: Strong national defense that is second to none.

Chuck Baldwin: PATRIOT Act violates principles of 4th & 5th Amendments.

Bob Barr: Real ID Act is Big Government at its worst.

Brian Moore: Question the Patriot Act, prisoner abuse, & domestic spying.

Brian Moore: Reduce weaponry & defense spending significantly.

Barack Obama: Repeal Dont-Ask-Dont-Tell.

Barack Obama: Support veterans via the Dignity for Wounded Warriors Act.

John Cox: Nuclear shield to make nuclear weapons obsolete.

Mike Gravel: Raze Guantanamo and Abu Ghraib prisons to the ground.

Ralph Nader: Repeal the Patriot Act; end secret detentions.

Michael Badnarik: Mideast hatred comes from US actions, not US lifestyle.

Gary Nolan: War on Terror has become war on civil liberties.

Gary Nolan: Bring our troops home from 140 countries.

Wesley Clark: Replace Dont-Ask-Dont-Tell with British policy.

George W. Bush: Created Ready campaign and Ready.Gov.

George W. Bush: Initiated reorganization of homeland defense.

George W. Bush: Increased security of critical infrastructure.

George W. Bush: Increased military pay by 4% per year.

George W. Bush: $400M for renovating and improving military housing.

George W. Bush: Missile defense for security, not for military advantage.

George W. Bush: Withdrew from ABM Treaty; now $9B for missile defense.

Howard Dean: Shift $1B per year from missile defense to threat reduction.

Howard Dean: Focus Pentagon budget on military personnels needs. Immigration

Chuck Baldwin: Seal borders; no amnesty; no social services for illegals.

Brian Moore: Give sanctuary to illegal immigrants & full social services.

John Cox: Amnesty is not the answer, nor are guest workers.

Michael Badnarik: Eliminate restriction on work permits.

David Cobb: Amnesty for undocumented immigrants after 3 years.

Howard Dean: If immigrants work & pay taxes, give them citizenship. Jobs

Chuck Baldwin: Reimpose tariffs on all foreign imports to keep jobs here.

Brian Moore: Mandate labor union representation.

Mike Huckabee: Supports farm subsidies & fully-funded crop insurance.

Barack Obama: Give public safety officers collective bargaining rights.

David Cobb: Organized union events for Teamsters, steelworkers, and UCFW.

Wesley Clark: Stop rewarding companies that shift jobs overseas.

Wesley Clark: Will support unions and a fair living wage.

Wesley Clark: Create best business environment, to create 1M jobs per year.

Wesley Clark: If labor assists with trade, minimum wage hikes will follow.

George W. Bush: Farm bill provides $40B over 10 years for conservation.

George W. Bush: Dedicated to improving economy through job growth.

John Edwards: Increase the minimum wage again.

John Edwards: Support unions; ban striker replacements. Principles & Values

Brian Moore: 35 Years of Civic Involvement.

Barack Obama: Active in the Trinity faith community.

John Cox: Constitution does not require freedom FROM religion.

George W. Bush: Building a Safer, Stronger and Better America.

David Cobb: Green party wins by disseminating message.

Gary Nolan: Focus on issues where majority agree with Libertarians.

Wesley Clark: The 100 Year Vision: physical and legal environment.

Wesley Clark: 30-year challenges: provide social framework.

George W. Bush: Calls on Americans to be citizens, not spectators. Social Security

Frank McEnulty: Raise the Social Security retirement age.

Mike Huckabee: Replace payroll tax & fund Social Security with FairTax.

Barack Obama: Stop any efforts to privatize Social Security.

John Cox: Private retirement accounts are best reform.

Mike Gravel: Put real money in the Trust Fund & invest it properly.

Gary Nolan: Replace Social Security system with IRAs.

Wesley Clark: Strengthen retirement security.

George W. Bush: Strengthen & modernize Social Security.

George W. Bush: Create Individual Development Accounts with low-income match.

George W. Bush: Ensure freedom of choice in retirement planning.

George W. Bush: Minimize investment risk through diversification.

George W. Bush: Strengthen womens retirement via catch up contributions. Tax Reform

Frank McEnulty: Move towards a simpler taxation structure.

Chuck Baldwin: End income tax, death tax, and property tax.

Brian Moore: Limit maximum income to 10 times minimum income.

John Cox: Eliminate the IRS; support the Fair Tax.

John Cox: Eliminate the Death Tax; veto all tax increases.

Mike Gravel: Repeal the income tax and close down the IRS.

Gary Nolan: Dems raise taxes on us; GOP raises taxes on our children.

Wesley Clark: Tax simplification via a $2,250 child tax credit.

Wesley Clark: Families First tax plan: fair,progressive,simple,responsible.

George W. Bush: Bush 2003 economic plan accelerates 2001 tax cuts.

George W. Bush: Tax relief allows saving & spending more of your own money.

George W. Bush: Deliver substantial tax relief to 91 million Americans.

George W. Bush: Everyone benefits from dividend tax reform.

George W. Bush: Married with children -- taxes drop 96%.

George W. Bush: Reduction in dividend taxes benefits 35 million people.

George W. Bush: Make the end of the death tax permanent.
